pages/workMainpage/workMainpage.ast:
#element{swiper} {depth: 1}
#attribute{bindchange: tagIndexChange}  
#attribute{current: {{tabbarIndex}}}  
#attribute{duration: {{10}}}  
#attribute{indicatordots: {{false}}}  
#attribute{interval: {{false}}}  
#attribute{style: width:100%;height:{{myHeightsize}}px;}  
#element{swiper-item} {depth: 2}  
#element{view} {depth: 3}    
#attribute{class: main_list_box}      
#element{view} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{bindtap: adddJumpClik}        
#attribute{data-tag: {{index}}}        
#attribute{style: display:flex;flex-direction:row;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:100%;height:100rpx;background-color:white;border-bottom:2rpxsolid#f3f3f3;align-items:center;position:relative;}        
#attribute{wx:for: {{arrJiejing}}}        
#attribute{wx:key: keys}        
#element{image} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{src: {{item.image}}}          
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:80rpx;margin-left:20rpx;width:80rpx;height:80rpx;}          
#element{view} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:80%;height:100rpx;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:nowrap;justify-content:center;margin-left:20rpx;}          
#element{text} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{style: display:flex;font-size:32rpx;color:rgb(58,58,58);}            
scriptdata{item.title}            
#element{text} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{style: display:flex;font-size:26rpx;color:rgb(198,198,198);}            
scriptdata{item.subtitle}            
#element{button} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{bindcontact: handleContact}          
#attribute{class: buttontype}          
#attribute{opentype: contact}          
#attribute{style: height:100%;}          
#element{swiper-item} {depth: 2}  
#element{scroll-view} {depth: 3}    
#attribute{scrolly: true}      
#attribute{style: width:100%;height:{{myHeightsize}}px;}      
#element{view} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{class: main_list_box}        
#attribute{style: height:auto;align-items:center;}        
#element{view} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{class: list_box}          
#attribute{style: width:{{listItemWidth}}px;}          
#attribute{wx:for: {{listArray}}}          
#attribute{wx:for-index: index1}          
#attribute{wx:for-item: item1}          
#attribute{wx:key: key}          
#element{view} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{class: listbox_titleV}            
scriptdata{item1.navbarname}            
#element{view} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{class: list_boxItem}            
#attribute{style: margin-top:5rpx;}            
#element{view} {depth: 7}            
#attribute{bindtap: PostManager}              
#attribute{class: box_item}              
#attribute{data-items: {{item2}}}              
#attribute{style: margin-left:1.5%;position:relative;}              
#attribute{wx:for: {{item1.workarr}}}              
#attribute{wx:for-index: index2}              
#attribute{wx:for-item: item2}              
#attribute{wx:key: keys}              
#element{image} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{src: {{item2.img}}}                
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:70rpx;height:70rpx;border-radius:35rpx;border:2rpxsolid#f3f3f3;}                
#attribute{wx:if: {{item1.id=='6010dc6d7ae6e009'}}}                
#element{block} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{wx:else: }                
#element{image} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{src: {{item2.img}}}                  
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:70rpx;height:70rpx;border-radius:10rpx;border:2rpxsolid#f3f3f3;}                  
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{style: position:absolute;height:30rpx;padding:0rpx5rpx;top:-10rpx;right:5rpx;border-radius:20rpx;background-color:red;color:white;font-size:20rpx;}                  
#attribute{wx:if: {{item2.auditnum>0}}}                  
scriptdata{item2.auditnum}                  
#element{text} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{style: display:flex;height:40rpx;margin-top:5rpx;width:100%;justify-content:center;font-size:22rpx;color:rgb(102,102,102);}                
scriptdata{item2.modelname}                
#element{view} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{class: main_list_box}        
#attribute{style: height:auto;align-items:center;}        
#element{image} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{bindtap: jumpWeb}          
#attribute{mode: widthFix}          
#attribute{src: {{bottomUrl.img}}}          
#attribute{style: width:{{listItemWidth}}px;margin-top:20rpx;}          
#element{view} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:100%;height:140rpx;}        
#element{swiper-item} {depth: 2}  
#element{view} {depth: 3}    
#attribute{class: my_infoView}      
#attribute{style: height:{{myHeightsize}}px;}      
#element{block} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{wx:if: {{islogin}}}        
#element{view} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{class: infoView_Top}          
#element{view} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{class: infoView_CenterView}            
#element{view} {depth: 7}            
#attribute{class: item_CenterView}              
#attribute{style: margin-top:20rpx;height:200rpx;}              
#element{view} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{style: display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:60%;margin-left:20rpx;}                
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{class: textlineShenlue}                  
#attribute{style: display:block;font-size:36rpx;color:white;max-width:100%;margin-top:20rpx;}                  
scriptdata{UserName}                  
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{class: textlineShenlue}                  
#attribute{style: display:block;font-size:26rpx;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);height:40rpx;max-width:100%;margin-top:30rpx;}                  
scriptdata{shopData.MerchantName}                  
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{class: textlineShenlue}                  
#attribute{style: display:block;font-size:26rpx;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);height:40rpx;max-width:100%;margin-top:0rpx;}                  
scriptdata{shopData.DepartName?shopData.DepartName:'无部门'}                  
data{-}                  
scriptdata{shopData.FirstName?shopData.FirstName:'无角色'}                  
#element{image} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{bindtap: touImageClik}                
#attribute{mode: aspectFill}                
#attribute{src: {{headUrl?headUrl:'/images/icon_user_default@2x.png'}}}                
#attribute{style: width:160rpx;height:160rpx;margin-right:20rpx;border-radius:80rpx;border:2rpxsolid#42bfa7;}                
#element{view} {depth: 7}            
#attribute{class: item_CenterView}              
#attribute{style: margin-top:40rpx;height:120rpx;}              
#element{view} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{style: display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:nowrap;width:60%;margin-left:20rpx;margin-bottom:20rpx;}                
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{bindtap: Changeclik}                  
#attribute{class: textlineShenlue}                  
#attribute{style: display:block;font-size:26rpx;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);height:40rpx;border-radius:20rpx;border:2rpxsolidwhite;width:auto;width:140rpx;text-align:center;}                  
data{切换门店}                  
#element{text} {depth: 9}                
#attribute{class: textlineShenlue}                  
#attribute{style: display:block;font-size:26rpx;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);height:40rpx;max-width:100%;margin-top:10rpx;}                  
scriptdata{shopData.ShopName?shopData.ShopName:'点击切换'}                  
data{
                  >}                  
#element{image} {depth: 8}              
#attribute{mode: aspectFill}                
#attribute{src: /images/myicon_Ercode@3x.png}                
#attribute{style: width:60rpx;height:60rpx;margin-right:20rpx;border:2rpxsolid#42bfa7;}                
#element{view} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{class: list_boxItem}          
#attribute{style: background-color:white;width:100%;}          
#element{view} {depth: 6}          
#attribute{class: box_item}            
#attribute{style: margin-left:1.5%;position:relative;}            
#attribute{wx:for: {{ItemArray}}}            
#attribute{wx:for-index: index2}            
#attribute{wx:for-item: item2}            
#attribute{wx:key: keys}            
#element{image} {depth: 7}            
#attribute{bindtap: PostMyPerson}              
#attribute{data-items: {{item2}}}              
#attribute{src: {{item2.img}}}              
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:70rpx;height:70rpx;border-radius:10rpx;border:2rpxsolid#f3f3f3;}

#attribute{style: display:flex;height:40rpx;margin-top:5rpx;width:100%;justify-content:center;font-size:22rpx;color:rgb(102,102,102);}              
scriptdata{item2.title}              
#element{view} {depth: 4}      
#attribute{style: display:flex;width:100%;height:180rpx;background-color:white;justify-content:center;align-items:center;}        
#attribute{wx:else: }        
#element{text} {depth: 5}        
#attribute{bindtap: loginclik}          
#attribute{style: display:flex;font-size:30rpx;color:white;width:80%;height:100rpx;background:linear-gradient(toright,#42bfa7,#39a3c6);border-radius:10rpx;justify-content:center;align-items:center;}
